item.title: X4
item.description: Intro OpenPPG X4 Controller uses WebUSB to communicate from your browser to your device. Make sure you are using one of the supported browsers We recomend Chrome. Get started Plug the microUSB cable into your controller and connect to your PC or phone. You may see a notification pop up from your browser. Now navigate to the config tool. Using the X4 Config Tool
